title: Bug 17289Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
OB: Bug 17289Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon) It does not take focusanymore.If I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The focus caretshould be in the first Combo "Host:".
SR: Open "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. Press "Tab" andfocus goes to the second Combo "Repository Path:".
